title: Add calendar widget to dashboard
description: As a project manager, I want a calendar widget on the dashboard so that I can view project deadlines, milestones, and scheduled activities at a glance.
iWant: a calendar widget on the dashboard
soThat: I can view project deadlines, milestones, and scheduled activities at a glance

acceptanceTests.title: Calendar widget displays current month
then: I should see the current month displayed

acceptanceTests.title: Navigate between months
when: I click the previous/next month arrows
then: The calendar should navigate to the previous/next month
The month and year should update accordingly

acceptanceTests.title: Display project events on calendar
given: There are project deadlines and milestones in the system
then: Project events should appear on their respective dates
Different event types should have distinct visual indicators

acceptanceTests.title: Click on calendar date to view details
given: There are events on a specific date
when: I click on that date in the calendar
then: A popup or panel should show event details for that date
I should be able to see event titles and times
